query: Can you help create a 5-day itinerary starting March 18th to March 22nd, 2022, for two people departing from Houston and visiting two cities in Colorado? We prefer Mexican and Chinese cuisines and have a budget of $7,200.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Denver,Colorado Springs]
